EmailTemplate.name: 201911_BK_Webinar_AeroFlight-SocialFlight_amr.Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Join us for a webinar Nov. 21 at 4 p.m. Eastern: BendixKing AeroFlight KI 300
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Ditch the Pump: FAA Regs & Tips for Electronic AI Installation
Date: Thursday, November 21, 2019 – 4pm ET
Have you registered yet? Don’t miss tomorrow’s webinar with Steven Pearce, avid pilot and Product Marketing Manager for BendixKing, along with SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic, as they discuss how to “Ditch the Pump”: regulations pertaining to electronic attitude indicators and vacuum system removal, as well as the AeroFlight KI 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]>.
Topics include:
- The Evolution of Attitude Systems - PFDs vs AIs - The regulations of replacement - Avoiding pitfalls during your conversion - AeroFlight KI 300
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner. REGISTER HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/275594091871253003]]>
